key.name: display-all-workspaces
key.description: If true, the window list will show windows from all workspaces. Otherwise it will only display windows from the current workspace.

key.name: group-windows
key.description: Decides when to group windows from the same application on the window list. Possible values are "never", "auto" and "always".

key.name: move-unminimized-windows
key.summary: Move windows to current workspace when unminimized
key.description: If true, then when unminimizing a window, move it to the current workspace. Otherwise, switch to the workspace of the window.
